title: [Stone Turret, Ground Floor]
description: The cool, stony darkness of this circular room is pierced by a shaft of sunlight coming through the open doorway.  A thick carpet softens the footsteps of the well-heeled gentry who stop to chat with the staff seated at a long table before ascending a twisting stone staircase.

A dozen tiny lamps, flickering in the draft coming through the open doorway, light this stone-walled, circular room.  A thick carpet softens the footsteps of the well-heeled gentry who stop to chat with the staff seated at a long table before ascending a twisting stone staircase.
